com.pom.crimson.api

Class GroupAdviceAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pom.crimson.api.GroupAdviceAPI

  • public class GroupAdviceAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    GroupAdviceAPI class contains functions to make GET,PUT,POST,etc calls to Group Advice Service API and receive response from same. This uses Rest Assured library to create requests and fetch responses
    Author:
    Sivaprakash.Selvaraj

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GroupAdviceAPI()
      Initializes the Base API class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GroupAdviceAPI

        public GroupAdviceAPI()
        Initializes the Base API class. The base API constructor calls the login method and retrieves the bearer token which is used for authorization of other API end points.

    • Method Detail

      • getWelcomeMessage

        public io.restassured.response.Response getWelcomeMessage()
        sends request to check if the Group advice service is up and running. Uses content-action-controller API. End point - GET /.
        Returns:
        Response with a welcome message.

      • getAllTopics

        public io.restassured.response.Response getAllTopics(java.lang.String topicType)
        sends request to get all topics related to Groups and Live events. Uses Group Advice API. End point - GET /api/v1/groupadvice/topic.
        Parameters:
        topicType - applicable values are either COMMUNITY OR LIVE_EVENT.
        Returns:
        Response with the list of topics and its details.

      • getAllGroups

        public io.restassured.response.Response getAllGroups(java.lang.String groupType)
        sends request to get all groups defined in dynamics365 CRM. Uses Group Advice API. End point - GET /api/v1/groupadvice/group.
        Parameters:
        groupType - applicable values are either COMMUNITY OR LIVE_EVENT.
        Returns:
        Response with the list of groups and its details.

      • getAllAvailableGroups

        public io.restassured.response.Response getAllAvailableGroups()
        sends request to get all available groups for the user. Uses Group Advice API. End point - GET /api/v1/groupadvice/group/availgroups.
        Returns:
        Response with the list of available groups and its details.

      • getGroupByUserID

        public io.restassured.response.Response getGroupByUserID(java.lang.String groupType)
        sends request to get all available groups for the user. Uses Group Advice API. End point - GET /api/v1/groupadvice/group/availgroups.
        Parameters:
        groupType - available values are COMMUNITY and LIVE EVENTS.
        Returns:
        Response with the list of available groups and its details.

      • getGroupByGroupID

        public io.restassured.response.Response getGroupByGroupID(java.lang.String groupID)
        sends request to get the details of a individual group. Uses Group Advice API. End point - GET /api/v1/groupadvice/group/{groupId}.
        Parameters:
        groupID - ID of the requested group
        Returns:
        Response with the details of the group.

      • joinGroup

        public io.restassured.response.Response joinGroup(java.lang.String groupID,
                                                  java.lang.String groupType,
                                                  java.lang.String topicID)

      • joinGroupV2

        public io.restassured.response.Response joinGroupV2(java.lang.String groupID,
                                                    java.lang.String groupType,
                                                    java.lang.String topicID)
        sends request to join a COMMUNITY group or LIVE_EVENT. Uses Group Advice API. End point - POST /api/v1/groupadvice/group/join/v2.
        Parameters:
        groupID - list ID of the group/Live Event to which the user has to join.
        groupType - applicable values are COMMUNITY or LIVE EVENT
        topicID - topic ID of the group/Live Event
        Returns:
        Response with the details of the group.

      • GetGroupMemInfoByGroupID

        public io.restassured.response.Response GetGroupMemInfoByGroupID(java.lang.String groupID)
        sends request to get the member info of a group. Uses Group Advice API. End point - GET /api/v1/groupadvice/group/{groupId}/members.
        Parameters:
        groupID - list ID of the group/Live Event for which the member details to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        Response with the details of the group.

      • GetGroupByLiveEvents

        public io.restassured.response.Response GetGroupByLiveEvents()
        sends request to get all groups by Live Events. Uses Group Advice API. End point - GET /api/v1/groupadvice/events.
        Returns:
        Response with the list of all Live Events and its details.

      • GetEventsByUser

        public io.restassured.response.Response GetEventsByUser(java.lang.String type)
        sends request to get all past or upcoming Live Events of an user. Uses Group Advice API. End point - GET /api/v1/groupadvice/events/user.
        Parameters:
        type - applicable values are PAST and UPCOMING
        Returns:
        Response with the list of all past or upcoming Live Events based on the type sent.

      • getEventByTopicID

        public io.restassured.response.Response getEventByTopicID(java.lang.String topicID)
        sends request to get all Events associated with the requested topic Id. Uses Group Advice API. End point - GET /api/v1/groupadvice/events/{topicId}.
        Parameters:
        topicID - Topic ID.
        Returns:
        Response with the list of all Live Events associated with a Topic.

      • getRecomEventsByUser

        public io.restassured.response.Response getRecomEventsByUser()
        sends request to get recommended events for an user. Uses Group Advice API. End point - GET /api/v1/groupadvice/recommendation/recommendedEvents.
        Returns:
        Response with the list of all Recommended Live Events for an user and its details.

      • getTopicByTopicID

        public io.restassured.response.Response getTopicByTopicID(java.lang.String topicID)
        sends request to get details of a topic for the requested topic Id. Uses Group Advice API. End point - GET /api/v1/groupadvice/topic/{topicId}.
        Parameters:
        topicID - Topic ID
        Returns:
        Response with the details of the topic.

      • getInterestsByTopicID

        public io.restassured.response.Response getInterestsByTopicID(java.lang.String topicID)
        sends request to Get the InterestIds for the requested topicId. Uses Group Advice API. End point - GET /api/v1/groupadvice/topic/{topicId}.
        Parameters:
        topicID - Topic ID
        Returns:
        Response with the interest details of the topic Id.

      • getAllActiveRecomTopicByUser

        public io.restassured.response.Response getAllActiveRecomTopicByUser()
        sends request to Get all active recommended topics for an user. Uses Group Advice API. End point - GET /api/v1/groupadvice/recommendation/user.
        Returns:
        Response with the list of recommended topics for the user.

      • getRecomTopicForUser

        public io.restassured.response.Response getRecomTopicForUser()
        sends request to Get Recommended Groups for the userId. Uses Group Advice API. End point - GET /api/v1/groupadvice/recommendation/groups.
        Returns:
        Response with the list of recommended groups for the user.

      • postRecomTopicByTopicID

        public io.restassured.response.Response postRecomTopicByTopicID(java.lang.String topicID)
        sends request to Save Recommended Topic for the requested topicId. Uses Group Advice API. End point - POST /api/v1/groupadvice/recommendation/{topicId}.
        Parameters:
        topicID - ID of the requested Topic
        Returns:
        Response with the list of recommended topics for the user.

      • createGroupInvite

        public io.restassured.response.Response createGroupInvite(java.lang.String groupID)
        sends request to Create Group Invitation. the invitation can be shared with others via any messenger tool to join the group Uses Group Advice API. End point - GET /api/v1/groupadvice/invite.
        Parameters:
        groupID - Id of the requested group
        Returns:
        Response with the Invite code, created date, expiry date and other details of the group.

      • getGroupByInviteCode

        public io.restassured.response.Response getGroupByInviteCode(java.lang.String inviteCode)
        sends request to Get Group Information based on the Invite Code. Uses Group Advice API. End point - GET /api/v1/groupadvice/invite/{inviteCode}.
        Parameters:
        inviteCode - Invitation Code
        Returns:
        Response with the group details of the corresponding invite code.

      • getRecommendedEvents

        public io.restassured.response.Response getRecommendedEvents()
        sends request to Get the Recommended Live Events List for the requested okatId. Uses Group Advice API. End point - GET /api/v1/groupadvice/recommendation/recommendedEvents.
        Returns:
        Response with the list of Live Event and its details recommended for the user.

      • removeGroup

        public io.restassured.response.Response removeGroup(java.lang.String groupID)
        sends request to Remove User from the Group based on roomId and userId. Uses Group Advice API. End point - POST /api/v1/groupadvice/group/remove.
        Parameters:
        groupID - ID of the requested group from which the user has to be removed
        Returns:
        Response with status of the removal request sent.

      • getSimilarEventsByTopicID

        public io.restassured.response.Response getSimilarEventsByTopicID(java.lang.String topicID)
        sends request to Get the Similar Live Events List for the requested topicId. Uses Group Advice API. End point - GET /api/v1/groupadvice/recommendation/similarEvents/{topicId}.
        Parameters:
        topicID - ID of the requested topic
        Returns:
        Response with list of similar events related to the requested topic.

      • getRelationByUserID

        public io.restassured.response.Response getRelationByUserID()
        sends request to Get Contacts Related to the userId. Uses Group Advice API. End point - GET /api/v1/groupadvice/recommendation/relation/{userId}.
        Returns:
        Response with list of topic recommendation for the related user.
